Package utils.yarn

package utils.yarn
This package contains classes for representing and managing yarn properties. It includes different yarn weights and allows filtering based on characteristics.

Key classes:

  • Yarn - Represents a single yarn object
  • YarnWeight - Stores weight-related properties
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    utils
    This package contains utility classes that provide helper functions for validating user input and handling project calculations.
    utils.inventory
    This package contains classes for managing the yarn inventory.
    utils.project
    This package contains classes for handling project-related logic.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Yarn
    Class representing Yarn.
    YarnWeight
    Class representing yarn weight.
    YarnWeightLoader
    Contains a static method for loading yarn weight from a JSON file (yarn_weights.json)
